page.title: 13Hexton Cricket Club
page.content: {Hexton Cricket Club}ground covers about{3 acres}of grassland in the centre of the village. It is used by the cricketers in summer and the Football Club in winter, by the village people for walking and the children for playing games on at all times. The Cricket Club has{30 members and the Football Club has 20. A few members live in the village but the majority come from other villages and towns nearby. Cricket is played three times a week on Saturday, Sunday and Wednesday against teams from the surrounding district. After a match the teams go to the pavilion to change and have drinks and refreshments. The School Sports Day is held there each year in June.
